subject: Re: [junit] Feature request: Support Test Cases on other VMs
msgSnippet: Jack, Did you ever submit this to Sourceforge?  Thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
Jack,

Did you ever submit this to Sourceforge? Thanks,

David Saff

On Wed, Aug 6, 2008 at 5:24 PM, jackcarden <j.carden@...> wrote:
> I tried to submit this via sourceforge, but I suppose that is spotty
> today.
>
> The test cases, as written and provided in JUnit 4.4, do not work
> properly with all other virtual machines.
>
> It would be nice to avoid the hard-coded dependencies on the
> name "java" as the name of the executable as well as the command line
> options that are supported only by the Sun implementation.
>
> See, for example:
> org.junit.tests.JUnitCoreTest and
> junit.tests.runner.TextRunnerTest
>
> Thanks!
>
>
